channel.title: Phoenix|Maricopa County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Phoenix|Maricopa County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 148 Offramp
item.description: I-10 East - Exit 148 Offramp in Phoenix. Use right lane for Sky Harbor Circle/Rental Car Return. Use left lane to return to I-10 East towards Tucson.

item.title: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10/AZ-51
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10/AZ-51 in Phoenix. Use right lane for AZ-51; left lane for I-10 East.

item.title: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10 and AZ-51
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10 and AZ-51 in Phoenix. Use right lane for AZ-51 North; left lane for I-10 East/Tucson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West - Exits 1B and 1A
item.description: AZ-202 Loop West approaching Exit 1B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 1A - 1-10 East/Tucson/AZ-51 North.

item.title: US-60 West - Thomas Road at 27th Ave.
item.description: US-60 west (Thomas Road) at 27th Ave. Turn right on 27th Ave. to continue on US-60 west.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201 Offramp at US-60
item.description: I-17 North - Exit 201 offramp at US-60. Turn left for US-60/To Grand Ave.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201
item.description: I-17 north at Exit 201 - US-60 West/Thomas Road/Grand Ave. US-60 west leaves I-17 north here.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West - Exits 1B and 1A
item.description: AZ-202 Loop west at Exit 1B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 1A - I-10 East/Tucson/AZ-51 North. Continue ahead for I-10 west for Los Angeles. The left most lane is for I-10 west HOV traffic.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exit 3
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East at Exit 3 - AZ-143 South/Washington St./McDowell Road.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East Approaching Exits 2 and 3
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East approaching Exit 2 - 40th St./44th St. Approaching Exit 3 - AZ-143 South/McDowell Road/Washington St.

item.title: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East
item.description: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East onramp.

item.title: N. 24th St. Approaching AZ-202 Loop and I-10
item.description: N. 24th St. approaching AZ-202 Loop and I-10.

item.description: Olive Ave. east approaching AZ-303 Loop.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 135 - 83rd Ave.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 136A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 136A - 79th Ave. This is a HOV interchange.

item.description: I-10 West at Exit 136B - 75th Ave.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 137 - 67th Ave.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 141 - 34th Ave

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 143A - I-17 North/Flagstaff and Exit 143B - I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 143 AB
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143 A-B - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 143C
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 143C - 19th Ave./Grand Ave.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 143 A-C
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143C - 19th Ave./Grand Ave. Also approaching Exit 143AB - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 144
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 144 - 7th Ave. Entering the Papago Freeway Tunnel.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 145B and Exit 143 AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 145B - 3rd St. (HOV). Approaching Exits 143AB - I-17 North/Flagstaff and I-17 South.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 145A - 7th St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 145B (HOV)
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 145B - 3rd St. (HOV).

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 145A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 145A - 7th St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 147A and B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 147B - AZ-51 North. Approaching Exit 147A - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 147 A, B, and C
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 147C - AZ-51 North (HOV). Approaching Exit 147B - AZ-51 North and Exit 147A - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 148 and 147AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 148 - Jefferson St./Washington St. Approaching Exits 148A-B - AZ-51 North/AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 148
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 148 - Jefferson St./Washington St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 149 and Exit 147AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 149 - Buckeye Road/Sky Harbor Airport/Rental Car Return. Approaching Exit 147B - AZ-51 North and Exit 147A - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 150
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150A - I-17 North/Flagstaff/US-60 West/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 west leaves I-10 west here.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 leaves I-10 west at I-17. Continue west on I-10 for Los Angeles and the Sky Harbor Airport.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A. Wickenburg bound traffic use US-60 west at Exit 150A.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles. US-60 exits I-10 here and joins I-17 through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/To I-10 West Truck Route. Hazardous cargo must use I-17 north through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 151
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 151 - University Drive/32nd St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 152
item.description: I-10/US-60 west at Exit 152 - 40th St. I-10 and US-60 continue west to Wickenburg (via US-60) and Los Angeles.

item.title: AZ-101 South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 2 - McDowell Road. Approaching Exit 1B - I-10 East/Phoenix.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 2 and Exit 1AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 2 - McDowell Road and Exit 1AB-I-10/Phoenix/Los Angeles.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Exit 23 and Exit 24
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West at Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff. All of the loop highways around Phoenix have different color shields on the older signs. AZ-101 Loop has a blue shield.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop West Approaching Exit 24 and Exit 23BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West approaching Exit 24 - 19th Ave. Approaching Exit 23 - I-17/Phoenix/Flagstaff.

item.title: AZ-101 West - Pima Freeway
item.description: AZ-101 Loop West - Pima Freeway

item.title: End AZ-51 North at AZ-101 Loop
item.description: End AZ-51 North at Exit 15A - AZ-101 Loop East and Exit 15B - AZ-101 Loop West.

item.title: AZ-51 North - Piestewa Freeway
item.description: AZ-51 North - Piestewa Freeway. Most freeways in the Phoenix area have names and are signed with the shields.

item.title: AZ-51 North - Exit 8
item.description: AZ-51 north at Exit 8 - 32nd St. No control city is given for AZ-51 North.

item.title: AZ-143 North - Exit 3
item.description: AZ-143 north at Exit 3 - AZ-202 Loop/Mesa. All of the loop roads in the Phoenix area have different color shields. AZ-202 Loop has a brown shield.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 161
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 161 - AZ-202 Loop East/Pecos Road. Overhead for I-10 east to Tucson.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 160 and Exit 161
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 160 - Wild Horse Pass Blvd./Sundust Road. Overhead for I-10 East/Tucson.

item.title: US-60 West approaching Exit 176AB and Exit 177
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 177 - Dobson Road. Approaching Exit 176B - AZ-101 Loop North and Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South.

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-Loop 101 Split
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop Split.

item.title: Blue AZ-101 Loop On I-17 South Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C Offramp
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C offramp. Use right lanes for AZ-101 Loop West

item.title: I-17 South at Exit 214C
item.description: I-17 South at Exit 214C - AZ-101 Loop. I-17 continues south to Phoenix.
